scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Andreea Ursu-Listeveanu
scrape.text: ‘How far are some parents ready to go for their children, what are the repercussions, and how healthy is the action of doing ‘whatever it takes’? These are the questions that everybody will ask themselves after reading The Dinner And btw, I’m with Serge Lohman on this one.
